text: 34|46|koraa, ‘ma'i tomalokaka kerala eta bisaye upadesa dicho, tomaloke allahara uddesye dujana dujanakai athaba ejana ejanakai uthi thiya diya, tara pichata tomaloke cinta-carca karai coraa, tomalokara sangijanara majata kono unmadana na'i. Te'om kerala asanna kathina sasti samparke tomalokara babe mathona ejana satarkakaraihe’.
